description: The BED_DAYS_MATCH table contains bed day information for claims. Different bed day types can have different weights which are applied to the quantity of bed day services to get a converted number of bed days for a referral.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the bed types associated with this claim. Multiple bed types can be associated with this claim.

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of the bed day type

columns.name: BED_DAY_TYPE_ID_BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)

columns.name: REL_WT_BED_DAY
columns.description: This item stores the relative weight of the bed day type

columns.name: BED_DAY_WT
columns.description: This item stores the total weight of the bed day type

columns.name: BED_DAY_QTY
columns.description: This is used to store the quantity of the bed day type services

columns.name: BED_DAY_CONV_RFL
columns.description: Converted bed days for the bed day type on the referral
